title: The Vegan Joint - Woodland Hills
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Thai, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: The 2nd Vegan Joint location, opened June 2011. A casual neighborhood cafe featuring an extensive vegan menu with Thai favorites like curries and stir-frys as well casual American classics like wraps, pancakes, and veggie burgers with fries. Soy products used are vegan, and seitan is made in-house. Directions: Main door entrance is on DeSoto Ave; or you can enter from the underground parking lot. It's the next attached shopping plaza over from the Target lot.
